entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Platform warnings in Windows Forms .NET 6 project #62885
  • IntelliSense should suggest static members when accessing through instance reference #62881
  • CodeFix/CodeRefactoring Support for AdditionalFiles #62877

Closed

  • Embedded JsonParser.TryParse throws FormatException #62883
  • `PasteKnownSourceIntoSingleLineRawInterpolatedStringTests` are failing locally #62880
  • Emit DynamicallyAccessedMembers for where T : new() #62857
  • Major performance regression of the array initialization pattern #62864

PullRequests

Created

  • Update method invocation escape analysis to match spec changes #62886
    Area-Compilers
  • Trivial refactorings around generator document identity #62878
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62882
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62879
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add external access for unit test generation #62633
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62876
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Revert "Add array initialization optimization" #62868
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #62891
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #62890
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #62889
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #62888
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #62887
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Produce binding errors for incomplete members #62874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE
  • [WIP] improve test partitioning #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Derive type names analyzer from AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #62869
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Record added node output states as new #61575
    Area-Compilers, Community
